text:
I was pleased with the food for the price. We ordered <Triafilos> (red pepper/feta dip, yogurt/cucumber dip, fish roe dip with pita), <lamb kabob> and Moussaka dinner.  The dips were excellent; the fish roe dip was fresh for sure. The vegetables as part of the entree had a good variety, which was a rarity for dinner at that price. 

Service was good. Decor was good. Not sure why business was slow on a Thurs night.
